name: Caesar VS Wizard
description:
A top down shoot 'em up roguelike set during the roman empire where you play as a wizard.

Story:

A wizard decided to test his sorcery skills inside the senate's secret chamber. During one of his many tests Caesar discovered the mighty wizard, now he wants him dead so it's time for him to fight for his life in the Colosseum.

Developed by Brovelopers
